document.full_text: pittsburgh steelers halfback rashard mendenhall remained a target of sharp criticism by twitter users on tuesday after he posted a message questioning whether news that al qaeda leader osama bin laden was killed should be cheered.
document.title: steelers' mendenhall criticized for tweets about bin laden
lines_and_colors: pittsburgh steelers halfback rashard mendenhall remained a target of sharp criticism by twitter users on tuesday after he posted a message questioning whether news that al qaeda leader osama bin laden was killed should be cheered.
